testcase.name: /seasons/{id} endpoint'ine gecerli authorization bilgileri ve id verisinin bulundugu bir GET
testcase.system-out: * Api kullanicisi "employee" token ile base urli olusturur..................passed * Api kullanicisi "seasons", 11 path parametrelerini olusturur..............passed * Api kullanicisi get request gonderir ve donen responsei kaydeder..........passed * Api kullanicisi response bodydeki data 11, "2024-04-25T14:47:00.192Z", "2024-04-25T14:47:00.192Z", "Aleyna", "2024-09-17T00:00:00.000Z" ve "2025-09-17T00:00:00.000Z" iceriklerini dogrular.passed
